document.masterDocTitle: Challenging the Wallacean shortfall: A total assessment of insect diversity on Guadeloupe (French West Indies), a checklist and bibliography

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Challenging the Wallacean shortfall: A total assessment of insect diversity on Guadeloupe (French West Indies), a checklist and bibliography

subSubSection.paragraph:
Genus
Brachymesia Kirby, 1889
.

Genus
Brechmorhoga Kirby, 1894
.

Brechmorhoga praecox grenadensis (Kirby, 1894)
. Donnelly (1970) ; Hofmann (1999); Grand (2002) ; Meurgey (2007); Meurgey (2008b) ; Meurgey and Picard (2011) ; Meurgey (2013) as
Brechmorhoga archboldi Donnelly, 1970
; Meurgey (2016b) .

Genus

.

Genus

.

Genus

.

Pantala hymenaea (Say, 1839)
. Meurgey (2008a) ; Meurgey and Picard (2011) ; Meurgey (2013) .

Genus

.

Tauriphila australis (Hagen, 1867)
. Guezennec and Guezennec (2009) ; Meurgey (2007); Meurgey and Picard (2011) ; Meurgey (2013) .

Genus

.

Genus

.

Tramea basilaris (Palisot de Beauvois, 1805)
. Meurgey (2008a) ; Meurgey and Picard (2011) ; Meurgey (2013) .

Tramea insularis Hagen, 1861
; Meurgey and Picard (2011) ; Meurgey (2013) .
